Pre-Game Insights: Captain Harry Kane is set to lead the line after overcoming an injury scare while on duty with Bayern Munich
Injuries have forced Ezri Konsa, Kobbie Mainoo, and Morgan Gibbs-White to withdraw from the squad
Surprise recall, Dominic Solanke has been called up for the first time in seven years
Phil Foden, Jude Bellingham, and Kyle Walker are expected to feature
Greece, meanwhile, have a full-strength squad, with West Ham’s Dinos Mavropanos and Liverpool’s Kostas Tsimikas likely to start
Despite being ranked 48th by FIFA, the Greek side will look to challenge England with a disciplined defensive approach
While Greece have shown resilience, it’s difficult to envision anything other than a convincing win for England
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be broadcast live in the UK on ITV1, with live streaming available via the ITVX app
